name: Dungeon Keysmith's Apprentice
description:
WIP for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Play as a smith's apprentice who must repair the single-use keys that plague modern dungeon crawlers. Powered by puzzlescript!

Controls: arrow keys to move, Z to undo a turn, R to restart.

If you liked this game, and especially if you have feedback, DM me on discord! orendorff#9993
